message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"to spend (money or time)","sentence":"妈妈花钱。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse style animated scene: A kind mother handing some money to a cashier in a simple shop. The shop is gently bathed in moody, soft end-of-the-world light, but everyday life continues. The focus is on the act of the mother spending money (giving bills or coins over the counter). Gentle, anime-like expressions and atmosphere, subtle hints of a world in slow decay outside the shop windows.","sentence_translation":"Mom spends money."}
